response: Created RequestQueue class with configurable concurrency (default 6), add-clear-flush pattern, activeCount and pendingCount getters, and exported apiQueue singleton. 6 tests.

response: Created LoadingSkeleton component with text, circle, rect variants, count prop, shimmer animation, and 7 tests.

response: Added selectionMode, selectedIds, onToggleSelection props to TableView. Checkbox column as first column when in selection mode. Selected rows get highlighted background.

response: Wired ComparisonView into App.tsx. When comparisonMode true, renders ComparisonView with filtered projects. Filter bar and Dashboard hidden during comparison. Back navigation resets state.
